body.description: FURINNO Cross leg Coffee table is stylish yet functional and space-saving for your home. A simple attitude towards lifestyle is reflected directly on the design of FURINNO furniture, creating a trend of simply nature. FURINNO cross leg Coffee table including extra bottom shelf allowing plenty of space for additional storage and display. It is easy to assemble and install. All the products are produced & packed 100% in Malaysia. Please follow the care instruction that comes in the package for details. Pictures are for illustration purpose. All decor items are not included in this offer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About the Manufacturer Bridging innovation with simplistic furniture, Furinno brings modern designs to transform your home into a one-of-a-kind oasis that will surely assist the compact and space saving need for your home. Furinno Modern Simplistic Living Room Collection Simple and Elegant Design Immerse yourself in a vast array of color and style choices where there are endless possibilities in combination of fashion and elegance with Furinno Simple Design Living Room Collection. We provide a wide variety of products that will lighten up and refreshes the look of your living room. Modern color style. Stylish. Functional. Affordable. Easy to assemble.

Premium Quality Materials Crafted from composite wood for sturdiness and durability. Lightweight, strong, and long-lasting product usage. Round Edge Designed with round edges for added safety to reduce accidental injuries. Ample Storage Space The ample tabletop and open bottom shelf for any decoration or personal items. Simplistic Design The simplistic and minimalist design gives the unit flexibility to fit in, no matter the setting of your living room.

Furinno Turn-S-Tube Wide TV Entertainment Center, Dark Walnut Furinno JAYA TV Stand Up To 50-Inch, French Oak Grey/Black Furinno Econ TV Stand Entertainment Center, Espresso Furinno Just No Tools Wide TV Stand, Dark Cherry w/Black Tube Furinno Turn-N-Tube No Tools 2-Tier Elevated TV Stands, Oak Grey/Black Dimensions 47.25 (W) x 15.9 (H) x 13.4 (D) Inches 46.85 (W) x 20.00 (H) x 15.55 (D) Inches 42.10 (W) x 22.80 (H) x 13.50 (D) Inches 41.30 (W) x 10.90 (H) x 15.60 (D) Inches 23.80 (W) x 11.00 (H) x 15.80 (D) Inches Maximum TV Size 42 Inches 55 Inches 42 Inches 40 Inches 24 Inches Available Colors Black/Grey, Brown Faux Marble/Brown, Cream Faux Marble/White, Columbia Walnut/Black, Dark Walnut, Espresso/Black, French Oak Grey/Black, Sonoma Oak/White French Oak Grey/ Black, Columbia Walnut/ Black, Espresso Espresso Dark Cherry/ Black, Light Cherry/ Black, White/ White French Oak Grey/ Black, Dark Brown/ Black, Espresso/ Black, Columbia Walnut/ Black, Dark Walnut

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love it !
reviews.reviewText: This table is so cute and durable . Quality is great for the price point and it just adds a little extra to my space . I spray painted the legs a bronze/gold to match my balcony decor and it came out perfectly .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst waste of money 💰
reviews.reviewText: This product was completely misleading. The pictures on the side that make it look like an X doesn't show it will not set evenly on the floor as the bottom of the Xs are not flat. The second shelf I tried to show in the picture looks like an amateur or someone whom has never used a saw as it was completely crooked throwing the table off balance and lastly I was not expecting it to be child height it's so close to the floor it's pointless. I attached pictures so others could be warned the saying "you get what you pay for " definitely stands true on this coffee table. If you're a college student just trying to make do or maybe your 1st apartment and you are trying to make do then sure otherwise please spend a lil more and get something that actually looks like an adult might own/purchase. Picked it up today to vacuum and the entire top piece fell apart in my hands. Unfortunately I have already thrown away the box or I would return it but I can't stand clutter and immediately tossed the box once I took it out and made sure all pieces were included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: EDIT: the whole thing fell apart. The top came right off. I just finished putting it together and have two leftover screws, and I know exactly where they’re supposed to go, however, they’re not gonna fit. I am still not entirely sure if this is my issue or the table’s issue. I took it apart twice and started over, looking very carefully at the not so helpful, instructional diagrams. I ended up giving up. It is put together, it seems sturdy enough, but I feel like it should not have taken me two hours to do. On the plus side, it is exactly as pictured, and, like I said, it seems sturdy enough for having two leftover screws. It will suit my needs. And for the price, I’m happy enough. Just really tired now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love this coffee table. The instructions were a little bit confusing for assembly because it was just pictures. It is made from particle board, so it's not extremely durable, and would probably break fairly easily if someone sat on it, but I got it on sale for $25 so I can't complain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and nice quality. Very durable too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to assemble and perfect for small space
reviews.reviewText: I have a small sunroom which I can't place a big or normal size coffee table. I saw this in Amazon and I love it. It fit perfectly for my space.It is very easy to assemble, and I did by myself- no help needed.No big tools involved and light weight but sturdy .Very useful for keeping decors and coffee/ snacks.Can hold upto 15lbs on the bottom shelf and 10lbs on the top which is good to hold decors and coffee cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars not terrible, but not perfect either
reviews.reviewText: instructions were clear, relatively easy to put together, took me just under an hour with a basic tool set — although it might be easier to attach the weight supports on the bottom with a power drill. overall, the table looks nice, it’s pretty stable but I’m not convinced it can support as much weight as the manual claims (the legs creak a little when I push down on the table). the main issue with this product was the quality of the boards, there’s a lot of scratches and marks on the pieces. a lot of the scratches are on the inside or bottom parts of the table, but there are visible scratches on the outside as well. for the price point it’s okay, but I’m disappointed by the quality of the finish. taking off the stickers that label the boards also peeled off some of the finishing, so I’m going to have to figure out how to cover the marks from that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible product. Don’t buy! Cheap, cheap, cheap.
reviews.reviewText: Awful product! Fell apart with first screw. Partical board broke everywhere and not from screwing too hard! Had to throw it away! WASTE OF MONEY! Very disappointed! I would really like my money back. This isn’t right.
It's nice but it's shorter than expected
After 2 years the table broke. I don’t even know how this happened.I guess that’s what’s to be expected these days. CRAP PRODUCTS.
Très fragile ! Très long a monter les visses ne rentrent pas dans les trous adéquatsTable hyper fragile un vrai gadget ! Je ne conseille pas ! Rendue !
Trop fragile, un bois en gaufrette.

reviews.reviewerName: Absolutely love this, fits perfect in my living room in
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great coffee table, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfect in my living room
